ygData.subject: Re: Lil bit from an Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When you get whirl till you hurl you will be MUCH appreciated hehe ... A little warning here...DONT join groups of people who want to kill off the Dark Elf
ygData.messageBody:
>Only after I mentioned that I could do a combination of see invis / invis
>did the group appreciate me a bit more (especially after large trains of
>elite gnoll guards / gnoll commanders in BB).


When you get whirl till you hurl you will be MUCH appreciated hehe

>Jewelmaking I would highly recommend to an enchanter, especially Dark Elf
>(since the Enchant: Silver spell is in Neriak and, from what I've heard, no
>where else; if I'm wrong, PLEASE tell me!). Once the Dark Elf Enchanter
>has the illusion spells, along with invisibility, there's no place that
>character can't go (more or less).


A little warning here...DONT join groups of people who want to kill off the
Dark Elf Guards for the exp and bronze weapons. You will be KOS (Killed on
Sight) regardless of what illusion you have on. If you have ANY plans of
jewelry making, then dont do it. Sure you can pay someone to go get it, but
i'd rather i did it myself to save me the trouble of finding someone willing
to do it, someone who is honest if they want you to give them the money (i
gave the money to one person and never heard from them again), and plus
would just like to be able to quickly get in, get it, and get out.

I thought that i could kill like 5 or 6 guards and still be safe...nope.
Made myself look like a Dark Elf to go in and get Enchant Electrum, killed
soon as i hit the bridge with the guards. do yourself a favor and dont kill
the DE guards.
